data.title: Allied Military Government of Occupied Territories
data.meta_description: The Allied Military Government of Occupied Territories was the form of military rule administered by Allied forces during and after World War II within European territories they occupied. The first instance of this inter-Allied model of government of occupied territory was manifested in Sicily after Operation Husky in August 1943.
data.text:
Military rule by Allied forces during World War II / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
